Text: err now one would like to know why someone would take 4 parts of a movie and merge into a full movie so that you will have to watch each part in diferent languages, seems plain braindead to me, maybe the person that did this hacksaw job should take up reading the blonds guide to making dvd rips
Okey..Filmen går inte spela upp på vanlig dvd spelare (bara på dom med stöd av dviX). Det finns 4 undertexter men ingen går o välja.
